items.name: BALANCED
desc: The legend entries are arranged in a way that the aspect ratio of the resulting legend is as near to 1 as possible.

items.name: CUSTOM
desc: The size of the legend is given explicitly.

items.name: HIGH
desc: The legend entries are stacked in a single column if possible.
If not enough space is available further columns are added.

items.name: WIDE
desc: The legend entries are arranged in a single row if possible.
If not enough space is available further rows are added.
